item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Hardware Product Launch Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor in the US to create a captivating hardware launch video.

Our product: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/kodjima333/friend-open-source-ai-wearable-recording-device?ref=7wc2iz

The video will be used to showcase the features and benefits of our new version. As the video editor, you will be responsible for shooting the video, editing raw footage, adding visual effects, transitions, and audio enhancements to create a professional and engaging final product. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio demonstrating their video editing skills, creativity, attention to detail, and ability to work within tight deadlines. Skills required for this project include:

- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong understanding of visual storytelling
- Ability to collaborate effectively with our team

Example of the "ideal" video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=22wlLy7hKP4 - it's obvious that this one is more expensive so we let's just try our best!


If you are passionate about video editing and have a keen eye for detail, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $10,000
Posted On: June 17, 2024 20:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: (Assistant) Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am a one-man-band video producer/shooter/editor looking to bring on a remote video editor to assist with projects, and take on projects entirely.

Looking for someone who is self-directed, problem-solver, good communication, with a strong portfolio of demonstrated work.

Need to be skilled in Adobe suite as well as Descript. Resolve is a bonus, as I may be moving toward that.

Please include a portfolio of editing work (testimonials, product promos, social, video podcasts, general corporate are all relevant - but include whatever demonstrates your skill). Looking for a strong sense of story-telling, as well as proficient use of transitions, sound effects & motion graphics.

Since this work will be remote, I'll need to know:
1) Have you worked long-term remote with anyone before?
2) How did you handle file/project sharing/syncing?
3) What project management tools do you use?
4) What time-tracking tool do you use?

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 19:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Descript, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Testimonial Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Descript, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Testimonial Video, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Health & Nutrition
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video

Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Health & Nutrition niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Health & Nutrition STORIES/FACTS

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/fx0kIEOL59Q?si=bO8SEpiHV6-F4-0V

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “strawberrylemonade”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 17, 2024 19:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
I'm looking for a video editor who understands copyright laws because of the content we will be showing. The video editor would also be responsible for providing the content from the streaming platforms.

1. Each movie should have the streaming platform posted in the upper right hand corner of the screen.
2. HQ video, visually stunning shots but NO spoilers.
3. Clear transitions between introduction, between titles, and ending
4. Captions for each video
5. Welcome screen with my "brand" Reel Uncommon before movie description
6. Great communication
7. 24 -48 hour turnaround time

item.title: Videographer Needed!- Indianapolis, IN - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!
I am seeking a videographer in the Indianapolis area for 8/23/24! Our objective is to shoot a 1 min video capturing our charity organization, Wicked Awesome Wishes, volunteering for children with life-altering conditions at The Children's Museum. The tentative plan would be to shoot for 2 hours then create the edit. The shoot should consist of our volunteers interacting with the children, event activities, etc.; we would open and close with our Wicked Awesome Wishes logo. I have attached a link to a video filmed in our North Carolina market as an example of what we're looking for. We would need a handful of still photos of our volunteers and attendees at the event as well.  All assets will be shared via email to use for the edit. We are looking for a fixed-fee project proposal. I look forward to hearing from you.
Thank you!

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 17, 2024 19:49 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Lifestyle, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Camera

item.title:
Join Our Team: Seeking a Creative Editor for Thriving E-Commerce Platform
- Upwork
item.description:
Who are we?

We are a dynamic e-commerce company managing several international online stores. Our diverse team thrives in a remote work environment, connecting from various corners of the globe.

As we grow, we’re on the lookout for exceptional talent to join our ranks and propel us toward our objectives with greater efficiency.

Whom do we search for? We’re in need of a creative VA with a knack for editing content across our e-commerce platforms. Your role will be pivotal in refining our product presentations and enhancing the overall shopping experience.

Ideal Candidate:

Proven experience in creative editing for e-commerce
Familiarity with online retail in EU Markets
Proficient in using editing software and tools
Collaborative spirit and excellent communication skills
Fluent in English
To apply, please send us your portfolio. We will review submissions and schedule calls with selected candidates on Wednesday.

If this opportunity excites you, respond with #interested.

Thank you!

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 19:42 UTC

item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to turn our aviation blog post into an engaging and professional reel. The reel should capture the essence of the blog post and present it in a visually appealing and captivating way. The video editor should have experience in creating promotional videos or reels for social media platforms. Attention to detail and creativity are a must. The reel should be approximately 1-2 minutes in length and include relevant visuals, text overlays, and background music. item.title: Professional YouTube Video Editor for Football (Soccer) Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Job Overview:
We are seeking an expert video editor to enhance our football video content from basic to advanced editing levels. Your role involves creating football compilations based on specific titles and collaborating closely with our scriptwriter and Voice-Over (VO) artist to produce engaging content.

Workflow:
Compilation Creation: Start by assembling a copyright-free football video compilation based on the given title. Retain the original sound of the clips without adding any original commentary or sound effects, as they will be replaced by our narrator’s voice.

Script Development:
The video is then sent to our scriptwriter who will creatively detail each clip. The scriptwriter is adept at fitting the commentary to match the video timing. You may need to adjust the video by repeating scenes, slowing down clips, or cutting excessive commentary to match the script.

Voice-Over Integration:
After receiving the voice-over recording, your job is to finalize the video edit by ensuring the audio syncs perfectly with the video content.

Personal Input: You are encouraged to contribute ideas to the script. This collaborative effort helps personalize our content, making our videos stand out and potentially increasing viewer engagement.

Content Focus:
Our channel features videos on various football themes like "Legendary Penalty Moments" and "Comedy Moments in Football." Each video typically runs for 8-9 minutes, focusing on delivering quality and engaging content.

Video Editing Requirements:
- Adhere closely to specific instructions and creatively enhance each video.
- Efficiently source appropriate clips and strictly avoid any copyrighted material.
- Employ creative effects to make clips more engaging.

Personal Requirements:
- A cooperative and team-oriented attitude with strong communication skills.
- Ability to deliver a first draft within 48 hours, and finalize the video within an additional 48 hours.
- A passion for long-term collaboration and enjoyment of the video editing process.

Budget and Compensation:
- The compensation is $100 per video, with an opportunity to produce up to 2 videos weekly.
- A budget review is scheduled after 15 videos or 2 months, with potential for increase.

Application Process:
If you are passionate about football and possess video editing expertise, please apply with samples of your previous work.

Looking forward to potentially working with you!

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 17, 2024 19:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Audio Editing, Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Mexico
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a thumbnail artist for my masculinity YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a long term thumbnail designer who can edit videos in the masculinity niche.

I am looking for someone who:
1. Good thumbnail designer with experience
2. Reasonable turnaround time
3. Be creative

I send the title + example thumbnail

I do not have any footage, you will need to gather footage from the internet.

If you have read the middle of this job description, please type your favorite male public figure active today at the beginning of your proposal.

Please provide multiple examples of thumbnails you have created in your proposal.

We want to upload 3 videos a week and pay $5 per thumbnail

We want the same quality videos as those down below.
https://snipboard.io/GPKfqE.jpg
https://snipboard.io/lv4yAZ.jpg
https://snipboard.io/J1Pmpv.jpg

Looking forward to seeing your proposals.

item.title: Whiteboard/Explainer Video Editor For Christian YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented whiteboard/Explainer Video Editor to join our team & assist us with our CHRISTIAN YouTube channel.

The ideal candidate will have a passion for storytelling, a strong understanding of CHRISTIAN teachings, and the ability to create visually appealing and informative videos. This role involves turning scripts and voiceovers into compelling visual narratives that resonate with our audience.

Responsibilities:
- Create engaging whiteboard and explainer videos based on provided scripts and voiceovers.
- Use AI to generate voiceovers when needed.
- Collaborate with the content team to ensure videos align with our vision.
- Incorporate images, animations, and transitions to enhance storytelling.
- Maintain a consistent and visually appealing style.
- Edit videos to meet deadlines and high-quality standards.
- Implement feedback to refine and improve content.
- Stay updated on video editing and animation trends.

Requirements:
- Experience in creating whiteboard and/or explainer videos.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Camtasia).
- Strong understanding of Christian teachings.
- Attention to detail and creative problem-solving skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.
- Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate remotely.
- Portfolio showcasing previous work.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Christian, religious, educational content or similar.
- Basic graphic design skills (e.g., Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop).
- Familiarity with YouTube optimization.

Start your cover letter with the word RELIGION,  and include a link to your previous work.

Compensation: $20/video
No of videos : 3 videos/week (12 Videos / month)
                                                                             
Link to sample video: https://youtu.be/tzLS4O7YaUg?si=nb0K1y_AeKI4-dXd

NOTE: Only those who start their cover letter with the word RELIGION would be considered for next steps.

Budget: $240
Posted On: June 17, 2024 19:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Animation
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Animation
Country: Canada
click to apply
